assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: LGS is the owner and CJR, BCB, CC are employees of Genetic Veterinary Sciences, DBA Paw Print Genetics. AG is the owner of Feragen GmbH. Each of these organizations provides canine genetic testing for inherited disorders on a fee-for-service basis to breeders, owners and veterinarians.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Upon request to the authors, the Standards and Guidelines Checklist (S1) in an interactive format can be provided to clinical canine genetic testing laboratories.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
